00041 TableMutatorScatterBuffer::TableMutatorScatterBuffer(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr,
00042     Comm *comm, TableIdentifier *table_identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr,
00043     RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator_ptr)
00044     : m_props_ptr(props_ptr), m_comm(comm), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr),
00045       m_range_locator_ptr(range_locator_ptr),
00046       m_range_server(comm, HYPERTABLE_CLIENT_TIMEOUT),
00047       m_table_identifier(*table_identifier), m_full(false), m_resends(0) {
00048 
00049   m_range_locator_ptr->get_location_cache(m_cache_ptr);

00057 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::set(Key &key, const void *value, uint32_t value_len, Timer &timer) {
00058   RangeLocationInfo range_info;
00059   TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter;
00060 
00061   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, key.row, &range_info)) {
00062     timer.start();
00063     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, key.row, &range_info, timer, false);
00064   }
00065 
00066   iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00067 
00068   if (iter == m_buffer_map.end()) {
00069     m_buffer_map[range_info.location] = new TableMutatorSendBuffer(&m_table_identifier, &m_completion_counter, m_range_locator_ptr.get());
00070     iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00071 
00072     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(range_info.location.c_str(), (*iter).second->addr))
00073       HT_THROW(Error::INVALID_METADATA, range_info.location);
00074   }
00075 
00076   (*iter).second->key_offsets.push_back((*iter).second->accum.fill());
00077   create_key_and_append((*iter).second->accum, FLAG_INSERT, key.row, key.column_family_code, key.column_qualifier, key.timestamp);
00078   append_as_byte_string((*iter).second->accum, value, value_len);
00079 
00080   if ((*iter).second->accum.fill() > MAX_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE)
00081     m_full = true;
00082 }

00088 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::set_delete(Key &key, Timer &timer) {
00089   RangeLocationInfo range_info;
00090   TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter;
00091 
00092   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, key.row, &range_info)) {
00093     timer.start();
00094     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, key.row, &range_info, timer, false);
00095   }
00096 
00097   iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00098 
00099   if (iter == m_buffer_map.end()) {
00100     m_buffer_map[range_info.location] = new TableMutatorSendBuffer(&m_table_identifier, &m_completion_counter, m_range_locator_ptr.get());
00101     iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00102 
00103     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(range_info.location.c_str(), (*iter).second->addr))
00104       HT_THROW(Error::INVALID_METADATA, range_info.location);
00105   }
00106 
00107   (*iter).second->key_offsets.push_back((*iter).second->accum.fill());
00108   uint8_t key_flag;
00109   if (key.column_family_code == 0)
00110     key_flag = FLAG_DELETE_ROW;
00111   else if (key.column_qualifier)
00112     key_flag = FLAG_DELETE_CELL;
00113   else
00114     key_flag = FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY;
00115 
00116   create_key_and_append((*iter).second->accum, key_flag, key.row, key.column_family_code, key.column_qualifier, key.timestamp);
00117   append_as_byte_string((*iter).second->accum, 0, 0);
00118 
00119   if ((*iter).second->accum.fill() > MAX_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE)
00120     m_full = true;
00121 }

00128 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::set(ByteString key, ByteString value, Timer &timer) {
00129   RangeLocationInfo range_info;
00130   TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter;
00131   const uint8_t *ptr = key.ptr;
00132   size_t len = Serialization::decode_vi32(&ptr);
00133 
00134   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, (const char *)ptr, &range_info)) {
00135     timer.start();
00136     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, (const char *)ptr, &range_info, timer, false);
00137   }
00138 
00139   iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00140 
00141   if (iter == m_buffer_map.end()) {
00142     m_buffer_map[range_info.location] = new TableMutatorSendBuffer(&m_table_identifier, &m_completion_counter, m_range_locator_ptr.get());
00143     iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00144 
00145     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(range_info.location.c_str(), (*iter).second->addr))
00146       HT_THROW(Error::INVALID_METADATA, range_info.location);
00147   }
00148 
00149   (*iter).second->key_offsets.push_back((*iter).second->accum.fill());
00150   (*iter).second->accum.add(key.ptr, (ptr-key.ptr)+len);
00151   (*iter).second->accum.add(value.ptr, value.length());
00152 
00153   if ((*iter).second->accum.fill() > MAX_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE)
00154     m_full = true;
00155 }

00157 
00158 namespace {
00159   struct LtByteStringChronological {
00160     bool operator()(const ByteString bs1, const ByteString bs2) const {
00161       const uint8_t *ptr1, *ptr2;
00162       size_t len1 = bs1.decode_length(&ptr1);
00163       size_t len2 = bs2.decode_length(&ptr2);
00164       int rval = strcmp((const char *)ptr1, (const char *)ptr2);
00165       if (rval == 0) {
00166         ptr1 += len1 - 8;
00167         ptr2 += len2 - 8;
00168         return memcmp(ptr1, ptr2, 8) > 0;  // this gives chronological
00169       }
00170       return rval < 0;
00171     }
00172   };
00173 }

00179 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::send() {
00180   TableMutatorSendBufferPtr send_buffer_ptr;
00181   struct LtByteStringChronological swo_bs;
00182   std::vector<ByteString> kvec;
00183   uint8_t *ptr;
00184   ByteString bs;
00185   size_t len;
00186 
00187   m_completion_counter.set(m_buffer_map.size());
00188 
00189   for (TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin(); iter != m_buffer_map.end(); iter++) {
00190     send_buffer_ptr = (*iter).second;
00191 
00192     if ((len = send_buffer_ptr->accum.fill()) == 0) {
00193       m_completion_counter.decrement();
00194       continue;
00195     }
00196 
00197     send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.set(new uint8_t [len], len);
00198 
00199     if (send_buffer_ptr->resend()) {
00200       memcpy(send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.base, send_buffer_ptr->accum.base, len);
00201     }
00202     else {
00203       kvec.clear();
00204       kvec.reserve(send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets.size());
00205       for (size_t i=0; i<send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets.size(); i++)
00206         kvec.push_back((ByteString)(send_buffer_ptr->accum.base + send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets[i]));
00207       sort(kvec.begin(), kvec.end(), swo_bs);
00208 
00209       ptr = send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.base;
00210 
00211       for (size_t i=0; i<kvec.size(); i++) {
00212         bs = kvec[i];
00213         bs.next();  // skip key
00214         bs.next();  // skip value
00215         memcpy(ptr, kvec[i].ptr, bs.ptr - kvec[i].ptr);
00216         ptr += bs.ptr - kvec[i].ptr;
00217       }
00218       HT_EXPECT((size_t)(ptr-send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.base)==len, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00219       send_buffer_ptr->dispatch_handler_ptr = new TableMutatorDispatchHandler(send_buffer_ptr.get());
00220     }
00221 
00222     send_buffer_ptr->accum.free();
00223     send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets.clear();
00224 
00228     try {
00229       send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.own = false;
00230       m_range_server.update(send_buffer_ptr->addr, m_table_identifier, send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates, send_buffer_ptr->dispatch_handler_ptr.get());
00231     }
00232     catch (Exception &e) {
00233       send_buffer_ptr->add_retries(0, send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.size);
00234       m_completion_counter.decrement();
00235     }
00236     send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.own = true;
00237   }
00238 }

00245 bool TableMutatorScatterBuffer::completed() {
00246   return m_completion_counter.is_complete();
00247 }

00254 bool TableMutatorScatterBuffer::wait_for_completion(Timer &timer) {
00255   if (!m_completion_counter.wait_for_completion(timer)) {
00256     if (m_completion_counter.has_errors()) {
00257       TableMutatorSendBufferPtr send_buffer_ptr;
00258       std::vector<FailedRegion> failed_regions;
00259 
00260       for (TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin(); iter != m_buffer_map.end(); iter++)
00261         (*iter).second->get_failed_regions(failed_regions);
00262 
00263       if (!failed_regions.empty()) {
00264         Cell cell;
00265         Key key;
00266         ByteString bs;
00267         const uint8_t *endptr;
00268         Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00269         for (size_t i=0; i<failed_regions.size(); i++) {
00270           bs.ptr = failed_regions[i].base;
00271           endptr = bs.ptr + failed_regions[i].len;
00272           while (bs.ptr < endptr) {
00273             key.load(bs);
00274             cell.row_key = key.row;
00275             cf = m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family_code);
00276             HT_EXPECT(cf, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00277             cell.column_family = m_constant_strings.get(cf->name.c_str());
00278             cell.column_qualifier = key.column_qualifier;
00279             cell.timestamp = key.timestamp;
00280             bs.next();
00281             cell.value_len = bs.decode_length(&cell.value);
00282             bs.next();
00283             m_failed_mutations.push_back(std::make_pair(cell, failed_regions[i].error));
00284           }
00285         }
00286       }
00287 
00288       // this prevents this mutation failure logic from being executed twice
00289       // if this method gets called again
00290       m_completion_counter.clear_errors();
00291 
00292       if (m_failed_mutations.size() > 0)
00293         HT_THROW(failed_regions[0].error, "");
00294 
00295     }
00296     return false;
00297   }
00298   return true;
00299 }

00302 TableMutatorScatterBuffer *TableMutatorScatterBuffer::create_redo_buffer(Timer &timer) {
00303   TableMutatorSendBufferPtr send_buffer_ptr;
00304   ByteString key, value, bs;
00305   TableMutatorScatterBuffer *redo_buffer = 0;
00306 
00307   try {
00308 
00309     redo_buffer = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(m_props_ptr, m_comm, &m_table_identifier, m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr);
00310 
00311     for (TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin(); iter != m_buffer_map.end(); iter++) {
00312       send_buffer_ptr = (*iter).second;
00313 
00314       if (send_buffer_ptr->accum.fill()) {
00315         const uint8_t *endptr;
00316 
00317         bs.ptr = send_buffer_ptr->accum.base;
00318         endptr = bs.ptr + send_buffer_ptr->accum.fill();
00319 
00320         // now add all of the old keys to the redo buffer
00321         while (bs.ptr < endptr) {
00322           key.ptr = bs.next();
00323           value.ptr = bs.next();
00324           redo_buffer->set(key, value, timer);
00325           m_resends++;
00326         }
00327       }
00328 
00329     }
00330   }
00331   catch (Exception &e) {
00332     delete redo_buffer;
00333     throw;
00334   }
00335 
00336   return redo_buffer;
00337 }

00340 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::reset() {
00341   for (TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin(); iter != m_buffer_map.end(); iter++)
00342     (*iter).second->reset();
00343 }
